question: In which of the following situations the force applied by the weight of a person becomes zero in a lift
option1: Lift moves up with an acceleration of 9.8 meter per sq. second
option2: Lift moves down with an acceleration of 9.8 meter per sq. second
option3: Lift moves up with an speed of 9.8 meter per second
option4: Lift moves up with down speed of 9.8 meter per second
answer: Lift moves down with an acceleration of 9.8 meter per sq. second
explanation: The weight of a person becomes zero in a lift. Lift moves down with an acceleration of 9.8 meter per sq. second.
